name: Elemental
description: A hungry Xorn feeds in an Underdark cavern. This card suggests an Elemental creature or reducing a thing to its essence.

person.upright: A person who uses magic tied to the elements or who is cartoonishly two-dimensional.
person.reverse: A person driven by an internal conflict between two opposed tendencies or influences.

creatureTrap.upright: An Elemental creature, or a creature that uses air, earth, fire, or water magic.
creatureTrap.reverse: A creature (such as a mephit) that combines the substance of two Elemental Planes, or creatures from opposing Elemental Planes.

place.upright: A place influenced by the Elemental Planes or associated with an element (such as a cave, a mountain, a volcano, or a river).
place.reverse: A place where forces of the Elemental Planes are in opposition to each other.

treasure.upright: An art object that incorporates material from an Elemental Plane or imagery of the elements, or a magic item that conjures or controls Elementals (such as a Ring of Elemental Command).
treasure.reverse: An art object that incorporates material from multiple Elemental Planes or imagery of elements in opposition; a magic item useful against Elementals.

situation.upright: Forces from the Elemental Planes spilling into the world.
situation.reverse: Opposed forces from two or more Elemental Planes entering the world.
